Presentation College is proud of its history and tradition, and is committed to the ideals of community service and intellectual and personal growth. A small school offering a truly personalized education, we invest in your success.
Begin your journey by completing the short form below. We'll create a personalized site that will provide you with helpful information based on your specific interests.
Please note: Presentation College will never sell or share your personal information.

Text and Voice Message Opt-in Policy

By checking this box, I understand I will receive future calls that deliver prerecorded messages by or on behalf of             Presentation College; and (2) having received this information, agree unambiguously to receive             such calls at a telephone number I designate. As an example, to receive future updates and promotional text messages             to this number on behalf of Presentation College. Message and data rates may apply to each text             message sent or received as provided in your wireless service rate plan.

Now offering our largest financial aid package ever!
Presentation College is truly unique. With top-notch academics, a driven student body, and excellent faculty, PC makes sure every student has a successful and unique college experience.

At PC students learn in an environment featuring a stunning campus, new apartment-style dorms, a winter dome and the new state-of-the-art Avera Simulation Center. Presentation Saints take pride in our mission of service to society and grow emotionally, spiritually, and intellectually. Remember, who you learn from matters and at PC the faculty are dedicated to challenging students with a curriculum that is designed to prepare graduates to either enter the workforce, or continue their education in graduate school.

“My classes here are quite small and you really feel that one-on-one with your professors, which helps a great deal. If you are having problems they know instantly who you are so they can talk to you directly and help you understand the material.”

"The best thing about the learning environment at PC is the Anatomy Lab with cadavers. The professors at PC are so helpful and amazing. With a lot of athletes on campus, the professors are very understanding of everyone’s schedules."
"I like how every one of my classes is close and small enough to have a one-on-one experience with the instructor. The environment is always outgoing and fun, everyone always has a good time."
Did you know? According to The Nursing Journal, Presentation College has the 4th ranked online nursing completion program in the nation.
Did you know? Presentation College is ranked 52nd nationally for having the safest campus in the country.
Did you know? Talk about the Suite Life. PC is ranked 94th for having the best student housing in the nation.

Ranked nationally as the 2nd best small college town, Aberdeen, SD, is home to PC's main campus. With mature trees, and beautiful landscaping, PC's safe and inviting campus is truly a place for higher learning.

PC Virtual is Presentation College’s distance education campus. PC Virtual offers specific online programs and is committed to assisting distance learners in accomplishing their academic and professional goals.
PC offers Master of Science in Nursing Degrees in two tracks: Nurse Practitioner and Nurse Educator. These Online programs are perfect for working nurses looking to further their education.
“I believe in our mission and in our students. We teach students to serve others and commit to causes they care about.”
Welcoming people of all faiths, Presentation College challenges learners toward academic excellence and, in the Catholic tradition, the development of the whole person.
PC has a Master of Science Degree in Family Nurse Practitioner.
Take the first step, apply today!

If you desire an affordable degree at a close-knit campus that excels at developing well rounded students, we would love for you to take the first step in becoming a Presentation College Saint; submit your application for admission today.

Your application gives our admission counselors the insight into who you are and what is important to you.  Knowing that information, our staff is better able to help you make an informed decision about why Presentation College could be the right fit for your educational goals.
It’s that easy!  Congratulations on taking the next step in becoming a Saint.

* Students are required to list all schools attended whether or not credit was received and regardless of the age of the record.  With the Federal Government requirement Presentation College will cross reference with the national database.
Once the application fee and all necessary paperwork are received, your application will be processed.
